title: PhD Positions (Theory & Computation)
details: We welcome applications from motivated students with a strong background in physical chemistry, quantum mechanics, or computational chemistry. Experience with Python/C++ is a plus.
how_to_apply: Email your CV, transcript, and a short statement of research interests.
